name: Nova Island
description:
On Nova Island, experience 1v1 card battles like you never have before!

No matter what you’re looking for, Nova Island has the gameplay experience for you! Take on one of many single player challenges or jump right into a competitive PvP mode and climb the leaderboards. Nova Island is FREE TO PLAY and FREE TO WIN!

Battle for territory on the most uniquely energetic game board imaginable! Collect Floral, Energy, Moxie, and Boom cards; then mix & match to create your own personalized decks. Play cards to gain strength, deal damage, or disrupt your opponent in a way they’ll never see coming.  Choose from a variety of Pros to strategically take advantage of the overwhelming Superpowers they bring to battle. 

There’s no time to waste in pursuit of the most precious resource ever known...NOVAS. Become a Nova Researcher – download and play today!


Features:

- CLIMB THE LEADERBOARDS - Battle against players from around the world in real-time 1v1 matches

- DAILY CHALLENGES – Earn rewards by playing wild challenges with a new way to play every day

- GO ON THE ISLAND RUN – Topple a series of Trainers in this single-player mode to win the grand prize

- BUILD YOUR COLLECTION – Discover and unlock your favorite cards using Novas you collect by playing the game

- CREATE DECKS – Develop unique strategies of your very own while mixing & matching cards of different types

- CHOOSE YOUR PRO – With Max, Flora, Dr. Boom & Jack, learn new playstyles and play them all

- FREE TO WIN – All cards & Pros are unlocked with Novas - NEVER with real money

- WATCH & CHEER – Spectate matches to learn from other players or just to enjoy the fireworks!

- CHANGE THE GAME – Become part of a vibrant community that will guide the future of Nova Island
